an5.75:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco yodhajivo rajagganneva disva samsidati visidati na santhambhati na sakkoti sangamam otaritum.
an5.75:1.5: Ayam, bhikkhave, pathamo yodhajivo santo samvijjamano lokasmim.
an5.75:2.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, idhekacco yodhajivo sahati rajaggam;
an5.75:2.2: api ca kho dhajagganneva disva samsidati visidati, na santhambhati, na sakkoti sangamam otaritum.
an5.75:2.4: Ayam, bhikkhave, dutiyo yodhajivo santo samvijjamano lokasmim.
an5.75:3.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, idhekacco yodhajivo sahati rajaggam sahati dhajaggam;
an5.75:3.2: api ca kho ussarananneva sutva samsidati visidati, na santhambhati, na sakkoti sangamam otaritum.
an5.75:3.4: Ayam, bhikkhave, tatiyo yodhajivo santo samvijjamano lokasmim.
an5.75:4.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, idhekacco yodhajivo sahati rajaggam, sahati dhajaggam, sahati ussaranam;
an5.75:4.2: api ca kho sampahare hannati byapajjati.
an5.75:4.4: Ayam, bhikkhave, catuttho yodhajivo santo samvijjamano lokasmim.
an5.75:5.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, idhekacco yodhajivo sahati rajaggam, sahati dhajaggam, sahati ussaranam, sahati sampaharam.
an5.75:5.2: So tam sangamam abhivijinitva vijitasangamo tameva sangamasisam ajjhavasati.
an5.75:5.4: Ayam, bhikkhave, pancamo yodhajivo santo samvijjamano lokasmim.
an5.75:5.5: Ime kho, bhikkhave, panca yodhajiva santo samvijjamana lokasmim.
an5.75:6.1: Evamevam kho, bhikkhave, pancime yodhajivupama puggala santo samvijjamana bhikkhusu.
an5.75:6.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu rajagganneva disva samsidati visidati, na santhambhati, na sakkoti brahmacariyam sandharetum.
an5.75:6.7: ‘amukasmim nama game va nigame va itthi va kumari va abhirupa dassaniya pasadika paramaya vannapokkharataya samannagata’ti.
an5.75:6.8: So tam sutva samsidati visidati, na santhambhati, na sakkoti brahmacariyam sandharetum.
an5.75:7.1: Seyyathapi so, bhikkhave, yodhajivo rajagganneva disva samsidati visidati, na santhambhati, na sakkoti sangamam otaritum;
an5.75:7.4: Ayam, bhikkhave, pathamo yodhajivupamo puggalo santo samvijjamano bhikkhusu.
an5.75:8.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sahati rajaggam;
an5.75:8.2: api ca kho dhajagganneva disva samsidati visidati, na santhambhati, na sakkoti brahmacariyam sandharetum.
an5.75:8.5: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na heva kho sunati:
an5.75:8.6: ‘amukasmim nama game va nigame va itthi va kumari va abhirupa dassaniya pasadika paramaya vannapokkharataya samannagata’ti;
an5.75:8.7: api ca kho samam passati itthim va kumarim va abhirupam dassaniyam pasadikam paramaya vannapokkharataya samannagatam.
an5.75:8.8: So tam disva samsidati visidati, na santhambhati, na sakkoti brahmacariyam sandharetum.
an5.75:9.1: Seyyathapi so, bhikkhave, yodhajivo sahati rajaggam;
an5.75:9.2: api ca kho dhajagganneva disva samsidati visidati, na santhambhati, na sakkoti sangamam otaritum;
an5.75:9.5: Ayam, bhikkhave, dutiyo yodhajivupamo puggalo santo samvijjamano bhikkhusu.
an5.75:10.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sahati rajaggam, sahati dhajaggam;
an5.75:10.2: api ca kho ussarananneva sutva samsidati visidati, na santhambhati, na sakkoti brahmacariyam sandharetum.
an5.75:10.5: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhum arannagatam va rukkhamulagatam va sunnagaragatam va matugamo upasankamitva uhasati ullapati ujjagghati uppandeti.
an5.75:10.6: So matugamena uhasiyamano ullapiyamano ujjagghiyamano uppandiyamano samsidati visidati, na santhambhati, na sakkoti brahmacariyam sandharetum.
an5.75:11.1: Seyyathapi so, bhikkhave, yodhajivo sahati rajaggam, sahati dhajaggam;
an5.75:11.2: api ca kho ussarananneva sutva samsidati visidati, na santhambhati, na sakkoti sangamam otaritum;
an5.75:11.5: Ayam, bhikkhave, tatiyo yodhajivupamo puggalo santo samvijjamano bhikkhusu.
an5.75:12.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sahati rajaggam, sahati dhajaggam, sahati ussaranam;
an5.75:12.2: api ca kho sampahare hannati byapajjati.
an5.75:12.4: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhum arannagatam va rukkhamulagatam va sunnagaragatam va matugamo upasankamitva abhinisidati abhinipajjati ajjhottharati.
an5.75:12.5: So matugamena abhinisidiyamano abhinipajjiyamano ajjhotthariyamano sikkham apaccakkhaya dubbalyam anavikatva methunam dhammam patisevati.
an5.75:13.1: Seyyathapi so, bhikkhave, yodhajivo sahati rajaggam, sahati dhajaggam, sahati ussaranam, api ca kho sampahare hannati byapajjati;
an5.75:13.4: Ayam, bhikkhave, catuttho yodhajivupamo puggalo santo samvijjamano bhikkhusu.
an5.75:14.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sahati rajaggam, sahati dhajaggam, sahati ussaranam, sahati sampaharam, so tam sangamam abhivijinitva vijitasangamo tameva sangamasisam ajjhavasati.
an5.75:14.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhum arannagatam va rukkhamulagatam va sunnagaragatam va matugamo upasankamitva abhinisidati abhinipajjati ajjhottharati.
an5.75:14.4: So matugamena abhinisidiyamano abhinipajjiyamano ajjhotthariyamano vinivethetva vinimocetva yena kamam pakkamati.
an5.75:14.5: So vivittam senasanam bhajati arannam rukkhamulam pabbatam kandaram giriguham susanam vanapattham abbhokasam palalapunjam.
an5.75:15.1: So arannagato va rukkhamulagato va sunnagaragato va nisidati pallankam abhujitva ujum kayam panidhaya parimukham satim upatthapetva.
an5.75:15.2: So abhijjham loke pahaya vigatabhijjhena cetasa viharati, abhijjhaya cittam parisodheti;
an5.75:15.3: byapadapadosam pahaya abyapannacitto viharati, sabbapanabhutahitanukampi byapadapadosa cittam parisodheti;
an5.75:15.4: thinamiddham pahaya vigatathinamiddho viharati alokasanni sato sampajano, thinamiddha cittam parisodheti;
an5.75:15.5: uddhaccakukkuccam pahaya anuddhato viharati ajjhattam vupasantacitto, uddhaccakukkucca cittam parisodheti;
an5.75:15.6: vicikiccham pahaya tinnavicikiccho viharati akathankathi kusalesu dhammesu, vicikicchaya cittam parisodheti.
an5.75:15.7: So ime panca nivarane pahaya cetaso upakkilese pannaya dubbalikarane
an5.75:16.1: So evam samahite citte parisuddhe pariyodate anangane vigatupakkilese mudubhute kammaniye thite anenjappatte asavanam khayananaya cittam abhininnameti.
an5.75:16.2: So ‘idam dukkhan’ti yathabhutam pajanati, ‘ayam dukkhasamudayo’ti yathabhutam pajanati, ‘ayam dukkhanirodho’ti yathabhutam pajanati, ‘ayam dukkhanirodhagamini patipada’ti yathabhutam pajanati,
an5.75:16.3: ‘ime asava’ti yathabhutam pajanati, ‘ayam asavasamudayo’ti yathabhutam pajanati, ‘ayam asavanirodho’ti yathabhutam pajanati, ‘ayam asavanirodhagamini patipada’ti yathabhutam pajanati.
an5.75:16.4: Tassa evam janato evam passato kamasavapi cittam vimuccati, bhavasavapi cittam vimuccati, avijjasavapi cittam vimuccati,
an5.75:16.6: ‘Khina jati, vusitam brahmacariyam, katam karaniyam, naparam itthattaya’ti pajanati.
an5.75:17.1: Seyyathapi so, bhikkhave, yodhajivo sahati rajaggam, sahati dhajaggam, sahati ussaranam, sahati sampaharam, so tam sangamam abhivijinitva vijitasangamo tameva sangamasisam ajjhavasati;
an5.75:17.4: Ayam, bhikkhave, pancamo yodhajivupamo puggalo santo samvijjamano bhikkhusu.
an5.75:17.5: Ime kho, bhikkhave, panca yodhajivupama puggala santo samvijjamana bhikkhusu”ti.
